html: (4) I have given him . . .—Better, I gave, the words referring primarily to the historic David (Comp. Psalms 78:70-71 ), though realised fully only in Him who was the “faithful and true witness” (John 18:37; Revelation 1:5; Revelation 3:14 ), the “captain” or “leader” of our salvation (Hebrews 2:10 ).
